title: Washed Up
description: It was just another day in the Emergency Department -- until she was wheeled in through the doors.Amanda Parks, my childhood best friend's mom who I may or may not have secretly kissed before leaving for college.I haven't seen her in over a decade, and in so many ways, she hasn't changed. Same killer curves.Same hypnotizing eyes.Same reaction from my heart when I see her.But something new?There isn't a ring on her finger anymore...And I'm much more of a man than I was at eighteen.Washed Up is a stand-alone age gap medical romance coming this winter!
author: Kandi Steiner
